entries.title: Texas Instruments Names Haviv Ilan as New Chief Executive
entries.description: The 24-year company veteran will take the top role at the chip maker.

entries.title: Amazon to Wind Down Charity-Donation Program AmazonSmile
entries.description: The move comes as the e-commerce giant lays off more than 18,000 employees, culling some 5% of its corporate ranks.

entries.title: New FTX Chief Says Crypto Exchange Could Restart
entries.description: In his first public interview since taking over the failed cryptocurrency exchange, John J. Ray III said that he is open to the idea of rebooting operations.

entries.title: Netflix Earnings Test Whether Strong Slate, New Ad Plan Can Deliver Customer Growth
entries.description: The streaming giant expects to add 4.5 million new subscribers in the fourth quarter.

entries.title: Crypto Lender Genesis Is Preparing to File for Bankruptcy Within Days
entries.description: Genesis has suffered steep losses from loans it extended to failed crypto firms Alameda Research and Three Arrows Capital.

entries.title: Mexico Bans California Startup's Experiments to Cool Atmosphere
entries.description: The solar-geoengineering project planned to inject sunlight-reflecting particles into the atmosphere with high-altitude balloons and intended to sell “cooling credits.”
